reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My white lamp was delivered in very protective casing with an instructional sheet. The light is just the right size, flexible yet durable, easy to charge & looks pretty. I especially like that it folds down that you can carry it easily in a purse. I bought an extra one for my granddaughter who loves it! Great price too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Keep this charged up in case of a power failure. This small inexpensive lamp throws out a great deal of LED light, better than a flashlight and takes up very little room. It folds up when not in use. You can charge it with your phone charger!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So cute & lightweight! Perfect for traveling!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a small folding lamp I could travel with and this fits the bill perfectly! I love how it fits in my hand and easily in any bag. It’s wireless and rechargeable with included cord. I love how simple it is, and the amount of light is perfect!I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because I really wish it had an extra USB charging port to charge other accessories (like a lot of small lamps like this) but the folding and lightweight aspects were more important for me.A huge bonus for me is that this isn’t a touch light in the sense of “tap it anywhere and it lights up”. I’ve used those in the past and they can be SO sensitive, where I often end up tapping it accidentally in the middle of the night & it lights up blinding me. Then you have to tap multiple dim settings to turn back off. This one has a clear icon where to tap on/off.Should also mention this only has one light setting, not multiple brightness levels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This little rechargeable lamp is a good buy
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this because my office is located in our basement and the lighting is not very bright and I wanted something small, portable, bright that can be recharged. Guess what, a day after charging this, for the next 48 hours we were hit with a snow storm and lost power. The little 'lamp' actually helped a great deal in lighting and I'm so glad that we've charged this because it lasted for 48 hours for us. Good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed, highly portable and stable, adjustable brightness. Recommended!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this little lamp so give light to wherever I might want it without a cord. It is stable and easily adjustable. I can aim the light wherever I wish. I came back to give a 4 star review because it was dim, but then I read that the brightness is smoothly adjustable by holding down the power switch. That takes it over the top. I really like that it is rechargeable rather than needing batteries, too. And it collapses easily into a small flattened bundle that takes little space. The light comes down from the flat lamp surface, so I can use it without it shining into my eyes. I can use it at night in a dark room and set it to very low brightness, so it is enough to read without bothering sleepers, and in a lighter room I can turn the light up smoothly to the level I need. I HIGHLY recommend this great little lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great cost-benefit for this product. It's a pity there's no option for warm light temperatures

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s nice. It’s useful.
reviews.reviewText: As a colorist, I have been looking and looking for a cordless desk lamp that offers close-up lighting. I’ve already had two others, and the connector for the USB cord came off — inside the lamp base, rendering them useless after the battery died. I got this one hoping — I could tell immediately that if I try and remove the USB it also will fall into the lamp base. So I keep it in all the time, which really does detract from it’s portability. As for the light? It’s decent but not great. The good news is it’s light (HA! - as in weight) enough to move closer to the coloring book, and also that it doesn’t tip over from a lack of ballast, like the other lamps do. It folds into itself very nicely, and will easily pack when I take it on travel. It’s important to note here that when it’s folded and packed, the light button is not activated, as happened with the other lamps I have tried - I would pack them, and when I got to my destination would discover that the light had been on the whole time. Not a great product, but I don’t feel I wasted my money. It is attractive, and is accurately depicted in the product photos, and it appears to be sturdy when folding and unfolding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great working lamp
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is just what I wanted - no cords to get in the way, light, small, varied lighting, and portable, with clean lines!
Very happy with compact lamp. Brightness is good, rechargeable, I will be using it for craft work in caravan.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wonderful portable light from a great seller
reviews.reviewText: The product is wonderful and met all my expectation from the description. It fits in one hand and it is light. I only have LED ceiling lights and this little lamp is definitely bright enough as an additional light source whenever I read a book or work on my laptop. It makes it so much easier to work and my eyes feel much more relaxed now. (It’s also wonderful for reading a book at a dim restaurant/bar without disturbing others.)And the seller is a fantastic communicator. There had been an issue with my order on the courier’s end (which is not the seller’s fault at all in the first place). Before I had even realised that something went wrong, the seller started working on resolving the issue, and made sure that I was updated as soon as possible every time there was a progress. I really can’t thank the seller enough for working hard on that.
Product is not very bright and is made of cheap hard plastic. Not very stable.
